name: Foolproof Dark Chocolate Fudge
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: (6 oz.) pkg. semi sweet chocolate chips

instructions: In heavy saucepan, over low heat, melt chips with sweetened condensed milk and salt. Remove from heat; stir in nuts and vanilla. Spread evenly onto wax paper-lined 8 or 9 inch square pan. Chill 2 hours or until firm. Turn fudge onto cutting board; peel off paper and cut into squares. Store loosely covered at room temperature.
